c371g2.ltc_safety.a_main

Class ConcernListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<ConcernWrapper>
        • c371g2.ltc_safety.a_main.ConcernListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class ConcernListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<ConcernWrapper>
    This class is used to populate the concern list on the main activity with the previously submitted concerns. It is only instantiated and used in the MainActivity class.
    Invariants:
    none
    History Properties:
    none

        public ConcernListAdapter(@NonNull

                          int resource,
                          @NonNull
                          java.util.List<ConcernWrapper> concerns)
        Constructor for the ConcernListAdapter class.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of MainActivity.class
        resource - The layout for each row of the list
        concerns - The list of concerns that will populate the list
        preconditions:
        - context is not null - resource is the value of a layout resource: R.layout____ - concerns is not null
        modifies:
        nothing.
